channel.title: [PI] help [PI]
channel.description:
i have 2 questions: how can i make a shop where anyone can sell everything and no one can buy . ? and: how can i make a shop which needs pk points to buy something . ?
Thats on PI .

item.title: [PI] help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“eri0nn, post:12, topic:394361”]i want to say that i want a shop where is nothing on it and everybody can sell anything . !.. and nobody cant buy a item . General STore.[/quote]tip = look at i buy anything shop in hybrid pvp v3

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Then you will probably have to rework the shop system, due to the fact that a shop can’t exist unless it’s declared externally (shops.cfg)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn

i want to say that i want a shop where is nothing on it and everybody can sell anything . !.. and nobody cant buy a item . General STore.

item.title: [PI] help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Another clue, make it so that when an item is sold to the shopkeeper, the item automatically gets deleted/reseted. This is can be done in shopHandler.java

Hope you’d get it

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:394361”]Why would a shop exist where you can sell, but can’t buy? The merchant would go out of business very quickly.[/quote]In reality your right. Not arguing though way to get rid of the eco cash.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Nasz, post:8, topic:394361”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=491544.msg3594637#msg3594637 date=1304960749]

Why would a shop exist where you can sell, but can’t buy? The merchant would go out of business very quickly.

It’s just for gp when people may be offline, or you just need quick gp. For some reason a lot of rsps have this option, usually for the General Store. :rolleyes:

Yes but you can buy from a general store.

A store that you can sell anything, and buy nothing is basically free coins. (inb4 america metaphor)
[/quote]

Touche ;/. I agree with you, it’s just that it’s on a lot of 562+ servers’ these days. I don’t know why… I guess to get economy started would be my guess. Like say theres’ no players on the server, and no-one too start economy I guess with gp and such… A player would sell the item too the shop and then repeat, but then again; he could just make NPC’s drop gp/sellable items too other shops. I don’t know what I’m on to lol… :P.[/quote]

Of course, if everyone starts with 25, + the basic tools (pick, hatchet, fishing rod, etc), then it relies on the players time and effort for the economy (as it should be).

Read full topic

Why would a shop exist where you can sell, but can’t buy? The merchant would go out of business very quickly.

It’s just for gp when people may be offline, or you just need quick gp. For some reason a lot of rsps have this option, usually for the General Store. :rolleyes:
[/quote]

Yes but you can buy from a general store.

A store that you can sell anything, and buy nothing is basically free coins. (inb4 america metaphor)[/quote]

Touche ;/. I agree with you, it’s just that it’s on a lot of 562+ servers’ these days. I don’t know why… I guess to get economy started would be my guess. Like say theres’ no players on the server, and no-one too start economy I guess with gp and such… A player would sell the item too the shop and then repeat, but then again; he could just make NPC’s drop gp/sellable items too other shops. I don’t know what I’m on to lol… :P.
